mapper.select: /* sample.qrySelectUserName */ SELECT USER.USER_ID , USER.LOGIN_ID , USER.USER_NAME , USER.LOGIN_PWD AS USER_PWD , USER.PWD_UPD_DT , USER.HP_NUMBER , USER.RECENT_CONN_DT , USER.SMS_CERTIFY_NUMBER , USER.LOGIN_FAIL_CNT , USER.MAIL_CERTIFY_NUMBER , USER.MAIL_CERTIFY_SENDER_DT , USER.APPROVAL_STATUS , USER.USER_PRIVILEGETYPE , USER.DEL_YN , USER.REG_ID , USER.REG_DT , USER.UPD_DT , CASE WHEN USER.APPROVAL_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 'USE' WHEN IFNULL(USER.LOGIN_FAIL_CNT, 0) > 5 THEN 'LOCK' ELSE 'NOTUSE' END AS STATUS , ROLE.ROLE_CD AS ROLE FROM cm_console.CM_USER USER LEFT OUTER JOIN cm_bo.CM_USER_ROLE ROLE ON USER.USER_ID = ROLE.USER_ID WHERE USER.LOGIN_ID = #{userId}
